website_summaries.verdict: Flexible beads, good fit for most customers, and two masks for the price make this duo your best choice if you are looking for a great deal.
pros: A convenient two-pack of flexible, beaded eye masks that fit most customers well
Can be used warm or cold
cons: Leaks after several times in the freezer have been reported
Eye holes could be better – seem misaligned on some users

customer_reviews.title: THEY LEAK-COMPANY REPLACED THEM WITH GOOD ONES
customer_reviews.text: I contacted the seller first, explained they leaked asked for refund or replacement, they never responded. These are comfortable and easy to use. Just leak. I have been using gel packs for years, and yes sometimes the manufacture misses a batch and they leak. Just fair to replace or refund. Won't buy from this company again. *REVISED* COMPANY SENT ME A NEW SET AND THEY DO NOT LEAK.
customer_reviews.author: margorat

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: According to the label, this mask can be used both hot and cold. So far, I have only used it cold. I store in the refrigerator, and anticipate using it for when I want to soothe tired eyes de puff the under eye area or to relieve tension I often suffer from migraines that causes tension around my eyes. I used this during my last migraine and it truly helped I recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Anila

customer_reviews.title: Works for intended use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to help with puffy eyes/facial pain, so I only really use them cold out of the fridge. They work pretty well for that use. As some other people have mentioned the masks don't really get close to the inner corner of the eye or sides of the nose. This doesn't bother me too much, but worth mentioning. Only downside I can find is that the beads sometimes pile up in one area and leave another less full, thus less cold. Not really a big deal though.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Miller

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about this
customer_reviews.text: These eye masks came with a note: "Before writing a negative review, please contact us and we will fix it." FIX IT HOW? Think again before getting these. It does not touch the eye area because as the beads freeze they become solid and the only place that they touch is the cheekbones--not a good product
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: So far I'm happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I just received the eye masks...I am having eyelid surgery in 3 days and I have to apply cold and then apply heat. I bought something like this from the drug store but I couldn't "see" while I was using this...but it was great...yours were IDENTICAL to the other..except that I CAN SEE while using them...I would have liked to have instructions as to how hot the microwave should be to warm them...I guessed and they were a "little toasty" but I think they'll be PERFECTLY for what I need...thank you for a reasonably priced product that WORKS !!
customer_reviews.author: kathy

customer_reviews.title: Meaningless guarantee/refund policy....just not a good mask for migraine sufferers
customer_reviews.text: One is lucky to get 10 minutes out of this product, using either hot or cold. Needed it for migraines. Messaged seller almost two weeks ago regarding refunding the product, as they had advertised.....and......crickets. Absolutely nothing special about this product in comparison to other similar masks. This set barely works at all. Much cheaper Wal-Mart versions actually work better, and at least Wal-Mart honors their refund policy. This seller DOES NOT honor theirs and won't communicate. BUY ELSEWHERE!
customer_reviews.author: -Z-

customer_reviews.title: There are 2
customer_reviews.text: As soon as these were delivered they went right in to the refrigerator. A couple hours later I grab one out. Put it on and laid down. So incredibly relaxing. I really bought them for when I have a migraine but I had been working hard in the heat. Worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki G.

customer_reviews.title: See through Eye masks
customer_reviews.text: I love having an eye mask that I can see out of while using. I am keeping one in the fridge/freezer and the other for warm compresses. My only challenge is that they did not come with instructions, so I'm not sure if it is safe to freeze or how long it is safe to heat in the microwave
customer_reviews.author: vjk

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, not great
customer_reviews.text: These are similar quality to the one I bought at the dollar store. They needed to be filled with more beads and they don't stay cold for very long, even after being in the freezer for hours. When frozen, they didn't conform to my face quite right, and they rested on my cheekbones more than my eye. However, it is nice that you get two in the pack so when one is not cold anymore, you can just switch it out for the second one still in the freezer.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley T

customer_reviews.title: Peep holes are a great feature!
customer_reviews.text: When I first put it on, it gave me a brain freeze. I moved it around to the needed areas and it was fine. Only took a few minutes to help the swollen eye area (after surgery). I would recommend this product because unlike the masks available at CVS or Wallgreens, these have holes so I could actually watch TV, which was nice!
customer_reviews.author: Marlene K Outlaw

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: If you want a mask that has barely any beads in it, look no further. How much more could it have cost to fill it all the way? .02?
customer_reviews.author: D. Can

customer_reviews.title: Great price! Just a little bit on the cheaper side material wise
customer_reviews.text: My mother had eye surgery and needed some ice to bring swelling and bruising down. These looked perfect so she could wear the mask and just relax. One pair (we got a two pack) popped as she went to try it on out of the box. Shot gel balls all over her and the floor.... just quality checks were missed on this product I believe. Sad it broke. She could have really used both of them. All in all she used the one and it helped her a lot! I was glad to have them shipped quickly, and help ease her healing. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Beverly J Lynd

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: Wow, so nice for relaxing or depuffing. Honestly SUCH a good product for the price. I love finding things like this on amazon because i don’t have to go searching store to store to find something that is probably lower quality. 10/10 recommend.
customer_reviews.author: marcus childs

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing 😎
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Perfectly met my needs. Fits my head and my son's too. Lifesaver during allergy season. It comes out of the freezer very cold if left in too long. Will get to the perfect temperature quick enough. I wouldn't overfreeze.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Gondor

customer_reviews.title: Overall great ice packs!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent addition to my migraine and general self care kit. Only reason I gave 4 and not 5 stars is that they truly only last about 15 minutes once out of the freezer. If they lasted 30 minutes + like my old ones they would definitely be 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley L

customer_reviews.title: Too cold to wear by itself; leaks
customer_reviews.text: I had to layer this mask on top of another fabric eye mask. By itself, it is way too cold to lay directly on your skin. It actually made my headache worse and made me feel like I had a brain freeze, but at the same time, it only stays cold for 15-20 minutes, so you don’t have much time to waste to let it “warm up” to a more comfortable temperature before using. When I layered a regular, light blocking sleep mask under it, it was fine. However, like many others mentioned, it is already leaking after two uses, so I would recommend investing in a higher quality mask.
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: IT LEAKS
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used the mask, I put it in the fridge for 30 minutes prior to use. After that I put the mask on and layed down for about 15 minutes before I noticed a weird slimey feeling in my eye. I immediately got up and noticed the entire left side of my face was BLUE from the mask leaking. I know that it says it's non-toxic, but that does not mean that I want the juices leaking all over my face. Also, I would understand if it was from wear and tear from using the mask a lot, but it was the first time I used it. :(
customer_reviews.author: Becca Leffler

customer_reviews.title: Quality product for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my grandma after her eye surgery. It was pretty intense and the ice packs she received from the hospital weren’t comfortable. They were bulky and hurt more to use than anything. I jumped on amazon and found these! Great price for more than one pair! She said they were so lightweight and soothing! She absolutely loves them. 10/10 I would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Mickenzie

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter she has dry eyes and gets black circles under her eyes but by using this product in the am and afternoon her eye problems have gone. She absolutely loves this product.
customer_reviews.author: ShayneTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Broke after two uses
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for obviously reasons......to use them. Both of them busted little blue gel beads all over the freezer after about 2 uses. The plastic is too thin and cheap to hold the integrity of the mask together. I guess you get what you pay for! Don't buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Britt Ozzie

customer_reviews.title: Helps headaches!
customer_reviews.text: I freeze it solid so it’s ready when I need it. I need to let it thaw. It at first or place cotton layer between it and my skin. I like it for headaches that I live with.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Nicer than expected. I really like this product and it comes with two, so one can be in the refrigerator and one can be worn. You are never without ❤
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't touch the right places...
customer_reviews.text: So really what this does best is to freeze your temples. You can't wear it for long at all because your temples get way too cold. Doesn't really touch under your eyes, so it's useless. I'm giving it 2 stars because it looks like it's supposed to look and I suppose a heated mask would feel nice. Unfortunately that's not why I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soothing!
customer_reviews.text: I have only tried the Spa Gel Bead Eye Mask after it was in the freezer. I have puffy eyes and the mask felt very soothing! I also noticed my eyes aren't as puffy any more.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Stays cold for a good 15 minutes
customer_reviews.text: Perfect cold mask after 40 minutes in the freezer - especially while cooking in a hot kitchen! I had one mask on my eyes and the other around the back of my neck for a good 15 minutes of relief. Glad it’s a 2-pack =)
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Deem

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried other face masks in the past, but this is the first that really contours to the face. It holds the cold and really makes me feel rejuvenated in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: CrazyCB83

customer_reviews.title: Works great after eye surgery
customer_reviews.text: Worked great after eye surgery. Kept me comfortable by decreasing pain and swelling. Used off and on each 30 mints while awake. Was SO much better than ice bags. Thanks guys
customer_reviews.author: Diane Pope

customer_reviews.title: This mask is a miracle worker
customer_reviews.text: This mask is a lifesaver. I battle headaches almost daily and the mask helps relieve the pain. Have a 2 pack means that I can be using one while freezing another. I have not used it as a "hot" mask so I can't speak to that but the freezing part is fabulous!!!
customer_reviews.author: Artina

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: It was just what I ordered! I use it for eye therapy. It keeps my eyes moist it was recommended by my doctor.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: They're not terrible!
customer_reviews.text: For the money, they're not terrible. They're not great either. When you prefer cold, which is why I purchased these, then they're cold for... 5 minutes? Not even. The material could be different, even if it's just one side that's designated for skin contact. It could be better. I should have went to my local Marshall's and found a better product for just as much.
customer_reviews.author: Destiny Flanigan

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: The mask is very stiff and doesn't stay on very well. It is either way too cold to leave on your face or not cold enough to bother. As it 'melts' it gets wet on the outside. I can still us it as an ice pack, BUT Wish it Had A Soft side on one the face side.
customer_reviews.author: SWEDE

customer_reviews.title: Average quality, low price. Reasonable purchase.
customer_reviews.text: PROs: Inexpensive (2 for price of 1). Suitable for intended purpose. CONs: Small on my face (but not too small for my gf’s). The gel seems to freeze much colder and “harder” than other gel masks. It makes it too cold to use right out of the freezer and less comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I gave the gel mask to my 12 yr old daughter who struggles with puffy morning eyes. She's used it several times and it works well. Much easier than dealing with a wet washcloth with ice cubes inside.
customer_reviews.author: Mare

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable but dont stay cold long and in the freezer they freeze so hard its difficult to use
customer_reviews.author: Randi

customer_reviews.title: 😊
customer_reviews.text: Saw on Queer Eye so of course I had to try. Used before big events. Good results. Just don’t leave in freezer for too long....BRRR
customer_reviews.author: Katie Kimble

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I just had brain surgery and these help so much with my headaches. They fit well, don’t slide down. Freeze fast and last a decent time. You get 2 for this price. Perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: rmonica68

customer_reviews.title: Needs more beads
customer_reviews.text: Not as plump with beads as pictured, the beads don’t distribute evenly so the cooling effect is patchy and not snug to the under eye where you actually need it most.
customer_reviews.author: Katie S.

customer_reviews.title: Too many "beads" and not enough cooling gel.
customer_reviews.text: Only stayed cool (not even cold) for a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: David.W.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Great for my headaches. Would recommend to anyone needing a nice cool mask.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Feels great with those sinus headaches.
customer_reviews.text: Fair price and easy to use for those with sinus and forehead headaches as I get. Wish they didn't cool down so fast, though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Value
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used it as a frozen face mask since that’s what I bought it for, and it’s very comfortable. It does not get “frozen” as in a block of ice, just very very cool, and it’s not uncomfortable even if you wear it the whole time until it warms up. 2 masks do come in the package.
customer_reviews.author: K James

customer_reviews.title: Quick 20min cold pack
customer_reviews.text: Really small, and the eye holes are tiny. I thought I would get a longer cold time, but they only last ~20min. Complaints aside, I still use them, frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Isis

customer_reviews.title: It came fast and in good condition but once it's frozen it's no longer flexible ...
customer_reviews.text: It came fast and in good condition but once it's frozen it's no longer flexible to lay on the area you need covered
customer_reviews.author: id

customer_reviews.title: These things are amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my wife but I love these things too. Heat them up or cool them down they are perfect for use when you have a headache. They feel soothing and comfortable....there are really worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew L. Rice

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love the mask. I use them for morning puffy eyes and When my allergies flare up. Great product. Flexible not stiff on your face. Would highly recommended it.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: I wish I could return them!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased to use after a upcoming eye surgery. They fit more like ice glasses which didn’t help. They don’t touch the eye area at all. The surgery got pushed back to this week because of Covid. I would have returned them but I missed the return window.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cooling, but short lived
customer_reviews.text: Work well, but they don’t stay cool for long. They are good while they stay cold, but that won’t be more than 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: I bought these to help with puffiness of my eyes ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to help with puffiness of my eyes. These don't actually touch the area around my eyes... maybe it's just the shape of my face, idk.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Lynn Parker

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is not what I expected.You cant freeze it and it is not very comforming to your face.
customer_reviews.author: michael g powlin

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and convenient
customer_reviews.text: I am over 40 and work alot of hours. Lately i ve been having puffy eyes. This eye mask helped undo that and give my eyes and face that young tightness. I love the convenience too. Great product for the price. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: They work great but be careful where you put them
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is these will start to smell like whatever your fridge smells like quite quickly. Other than that they work well.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: JUST PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: Say bye to the bags under your eyes and get ready for some relaxation with these masks. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: My aching eyes are in heaven. I keep one for heat and one for cold
customer_reviews.author: Margaret M.

customer_reviews.title: Inserts for eye lids
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would cover my eye lid, but it didn't. They didn't stay cold long enough.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Hensley

customer_reviews.title: Great and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for swelling around my eyes due to allergies works great
customer_reviews.author: Angela Breeding

customer_reviews.title: the fit
customer_reviews.text: I like the holes for eyes so that I can do other things while wearing it. I really like having two of them. I can keep one cold and wear the other. its comfortable and feels good.
customer_reviews.author: Dee A

customer_reviews.title: Helps to be able to see, glad eye holes put in these
customer_reviews.text: I like that has eye holes in them. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Crackediphonescreen

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I have migraines and there are times I cannot stop what I am doing. This eye mask is perfect to help with my daily migraines and still allows me to continue my life.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Metcalf

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my mother-in-law and my wife.They love it, my wife uses it every morning so dose my mother-in-law and after yard work I ware it to help cool down
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: worked great for me
customer_reviews.text: I used these after eye surgery - they were very comfortable and worked well for what I needed. Used them both for cold and warm and they worked equally as well.
customer_reviews.author: Laura H

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: its ok but doesnt stay cold long enough..however for the price not to shabby
customer_reviews.author: c l r

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It is one of the only things that will relieves my migraines the quality is good and the shipping was great. The company is very professional as well!
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable - hoping it lasts longer than other gel bead masks
customer_reviews.text: I use these masks for relief from sinus headaches and migraines. Most gel bead masks only last a few weeks before busting a leak somewhere and then I have to throw away. I’ve only had this for a week and so far so good - I will come back in a few weeks to see if it’s still going strong!
customer_reviews.author: D. Saunders

customer_reviews.title: A comfortable product
customer_reviews.text: This product sits well around your eyes. Other ice packs we have used go directly on your eyes which causes discomfort. Very comfortable, very relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Lee

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Love the product! It's really comfortable and keeps holds unlike others that I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: jimmy soltero

customer_reviews.title: Looking forward to having the time to use the beaded eye mask
customer_reviews.text: There are two, which is a plus. Both are cooling in the fridge... Maybe this weekend will be the launch date! I can feel the coolness already!
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The coldness does not last very long, only 5 to 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing product. Only got 6 uses from it before it broke causing the blue gel to spill out. Not worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall great product, but for whatever reason the eye holes ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall great product, but for whatever reason the eye holes appealed to me, but now realizing that cold over the eyes feels good, so kinda wish it was all one piece without the holes, but all good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping time and the masks are great! I use mine frozen to relieve headaches and pressure. A great buy!
customer_reviews.author: thatsoalexandra

customer_reviews.title: My mother-in-law was pleased!
customer_reviews.text: It came in in a good shape and delivery was on time. I bought it for my my mom-in-law and since then I always saw her using it, regularly. She really likes it. She even takes it wherever she goes..
customer_reviews.author: Juliemae Talaroc

customer_reviews.title: Defiantly recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I give this product 5 stars. Omg it helped tremulousy with my sinus headaches. Defiantly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product/Great gift
customer_reviews.text: This is a Christmas gift and I’m really excited about it! It came fast and looks great! Can’t wait to see her reaction when she gets it!
customer_reviews.author: Walter Hummel

customer_reviews.title: Was exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Was exactly as described and arrived on time. It was a perfect stocking stuffer.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Frozen
customer_reviews.text: Almost tooooo cold after putting in the freezer. Let it defrost a bit before putting on and after that very enjoyeable!

customer_reviews.title: the straps are too short to go around your head ...
customer_reviews.text: the straps are too short to go around your head and the nose cut out Is too small to let the mask touch your face.

customer_reviews.title: Nice that I can still get ready for work in ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice that I can still get ready for work in the morning while wearing it, instead of laying back down for an extra 15 minutes!

customer_reviews.title: Too large and didn’t fit
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t fit my face at all and too loose. Wasn’t able to use at all

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It arrived safely and when promised. I think that it will help me with y puffy eyes.

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have migraines and this is definitely helpful. Thank you😊

customer_reviews.text: great product, use it daily first thing in the morning, takes the morning puffy eyes away, wrinkles and eye bags disappear

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: it seems to be made well, have not used it yet, it is a gift.

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my eyes, works well, stays in place and gets the job done.

customer_reviews.title: Works on everyone!
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is cold 🥶 and relaxes my eye area after a long days work!

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what i needed. Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: It does lose its cool quickly, but good that they send two.

customer_reviews.title: Great masks
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for summer days ahead. These are my favorite cool down methods.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Very refreshing to use in the morning!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a good buy! Feels amazing on my face and eyes :)

customer_reviews.text: Material rubs against top of ears and is uncomfortable over time.

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my headaches and puffy eyes
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my headaches and puffy eyes. I love having 2 so one at least can always be cold when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: dont waste your money
customer_reviews.text: after several uses the plastic couldn't handle freezing and broke. There needs to be something like cloth around the eyes because it sticks to face and is extremely cold too cold to put around eyes.
customer_reviews.author: sb

customer_reviews.title: I've had bad gel eye masks in the past that would basically ...
customer_reviews.text: These things have been life savers, relieving me often from my chronic migraines I get. I've had bad gel eye masks in the past that would basically explode from overuse within a week or two. But these have been lasting me 4 months now with constant microwaving (13 seconds gives me enough heat [and yes, I'm the odd case where heat helps my migraines more than cold]). That said, I've yet to try cooling or freezing these. But they're certainly durable and I'm sure they'd work well in those cases too.
customer_reviews.author: Collin

customer_reviews.title: These dont stay cold very long and the instructions are ...
customer_reviews.text: These dont stay cold very long and the instructions are to put the mask in the freezer 1-2 hours before you need it but not any longer. Not very convenient if you want to use in the event of sudden headache or having to remove it before 2 hours.
customer_reviews.author: ElissaMarie

customer_reviews.title: I SUFFER WITH MIGRAINES AND I USE COLD PACKS ON ...
customer_reviews.text: I SUFFER WITH MIGRAINES AND I USE COLD PACKS ON MY HEAD TO HELP .. THESE LET ME WATCH TV IF THE HEAD PAIN ALLOWS , AND GET SOME HOUSE WORK DONE WHILE STILL GETTING SOME RELIEF FROM MY PAIN ... I HAVE BOUGHT MANY SO I CAN ALWAYS HAVE A COLD ONE READY TO JUST KEEP REPLACING THEM AS THEY DEFROST FROM THE BODY HEAT OF MY HEAD AND NECK ...
customer_reviews.author: REGINA GUIDRY

customer_reviews.title: Best for Hot Treatment
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my post-op hot treatment (already had the cold treatment for 2-weeks). Just 10-12 seconds on each side in the microwave provided enough heat/warmth for 10-15 minutes treatment. Place over a facial tissue and momentarily push to redistribute the beads for a more even and longer lasting of constant heat. Can't say much about cold treatment; but understand why some were not please because our different facial features and curvatures. The twin packs may help double the time for cold treatment. For those need for hot treatment I will definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Your Everyday Joe

customer_reviews.title: Plastic on bare skin...nah
customer_reviews.text: I wish these had a fabric cover on one side, because plastic on bare skin either makes the skin sweat when the mask is warm or burns to the point of being unusable when frozen. I'm only keeping these because my kid loves to play with them.
customer_reviews.author: Iryna Hall

customer_reviews.title: Icy cold plastic is actually painful to the
customer_reviews.text: No felt pad against your skin. Icy cold plastic is actually painful to the skin
customer_reviews.author: Brian L.

customer_reviews.title: I wish it would've stayed colder for a longer than 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these eye masks because I needed an ice pack for my face, because I had surgery on my cheek. The eye masks are okay, they can be frozen or heated up. I have only tried them frozen, and they don't stay cold for very long. It thawed out pretty quick, after only being on my face for 15 minutes. I wish it would've stayed colder for a longer period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany B

product_meta.title: 2 Redesigned Therapeutic Spa Gel Bead Eye Mask - Hot or Cold Reusable Ice Packs with Flexible Beads - Compress Therapy for Puffy Eyes, Dark Circles, Headaches, Migraines, Stress Relief, Facial Pain
feature_bullets: PAIN RELIEF - Our gel bead masks help relieve pain where you need it most. Whether you are looking for relief from a migraine, headache, puffy eyes or just to relax, our gel bead mask is here to help. Having the eye cut outs on the mask allows you to relax while still being able to watch TV or finish up some work around the house. Our mask will sit flush against your face making sufficient skin contact to give you the relief you are looking for. Each mask is filled with non-toxic gel beads that

COLD THERAPY - Ice packs are the most common way to treat injuries or soothe pain. It is easy to use and requires very little time or expertise. Cold therapy also helps with reducing sunburn, swelling and puffiness. After a long day an ice cold mask can make you feel truly relaxed. Gel beads allow the face mask to stay flexible while retaining its temperature. Apply 15-20 minutes at a time for best results.

HEAT THERAPY - Using heat therapy is common for chronic pain or injuries. It should be used at least 24 hours after an injury once swelling and bleeding has stopped. Apply 15-20 minutes at a time. Our heat packs are excellent at retaining heat. Heat therapy should never be hot to the point of burning the skin. The most effective heat therapy is using a warm temperature. 10 - 15 seconds in the microwave is all that is needed.

MULTIPLE USES - Hot and cold masks are so popular due to their versatility. They can be used for pain, allergies, head colds, sunburns and so much more. You can even use them before bed to relax your eyes from a long day.

MONEY BACK GUARANTEE- We are so sure that you will love our product that it comes with a 30 day Risk-Free 100% money-back-guarantee. If you are not fully satisfied with our product, let us know and receive a full refund.
